txt_en: The best cure is the laughing cure.
We humans are alone in this world for a reason.
Sometimes what you want is right in front of you.
You can't undo the past. All you can do is face what's ahead.
Memories connect humans even when they are apart.
txt_cn: 即便分离，回忆仍能连接你我。

txt_en: You can't change the world, but you can change yourself.
txt_cn: 你无法改变世界，但你可以改变自己。
